Name: BorderCollie Blaster
About the game: Kira is back! In this arcade style shoot ´em up you´ll encounter different foes, defeat big alien bosses and collect power-ups and new weapons to fight your way through exciting stages and find the holy bone Kira (the star of the game) is looking for. - a digitized Border Collie - 12 exciting stages (from from dusky city stages to the outer space to lava caves right into 'Castle Canis' and its catacombs) - two stages as hommage to an old classic game... - hand-placed enemy waves - bossfights at the end of each stage - all the money from the game will be used for Kira!! (food, dog toys, vet bills etc.)
